name: Death Escape - Fall 2017 - 470
description: In our game the players take on the role of a servant hired by an adventurer to help him explore the old ruins of a temple. The sole responsibility of the player is to observe their surroundings when exploring the booby trapped hallways of this old temple and set off each trap to clear a path for the explorer who hired them. Set off traps one by one, within an ancient palace to guarantee this explorer a safe passage to the treasure room.
